reivew: I ordered a fridge over six weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. I had to throw out all my meat!!!
My kid wanted a MacBook for the new semester and I thought it was out of our price range. But with DiscountPal I picked one up for the same price as a windows laptop. Very happy :)
Great deal on our new lounge suite.
Happy with the jacket I bought, definitely cheaper but not the huge savings I was hoping for.
I got the wrong size which is my own fault but I would prefer an easier returns process.
Been needing to upgrade the TV for ages and was waiting for the right deal - saved nearly a grand on this one!
My son has been wanting one of these for months - I don't think I saved much but just happy I could get one
Getting my Christmas shopping in early and this baby yoda was on my list - good savings
Was going to get my FIL a cheap decanter but DiscountPal had a proper one in my price range!
product: Waterford Crystal Decanter and Tumbler Set
